flawed_nl_solution:
After one year he earns $200 in interest because 1000 x 0.2 = <<1000*0.2=200>>200
After one year it has $1,200 in the account because 1000 + 200 = <<1000+200=1200>>1200
He takes out $600 because 1200 / 2 = <<1200/2=600>>600
After this it has $600 in it because 1200 - 600 = <<1200-600=60>>60
She earns $90 in interest because 60 x 0.15 = <<60*0.15=9>>9
The account now has $69 because 60 + 9 = <<60+9=69>>69
#### 69

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600, not 60. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
